DOC.brief_summary: In past year several shoulder reconstruction system different type prostheses fixation method develop improve shoulder arthroplasty , try cover wide range pathology revision situation . The aim present study report radiological clinical outcome stemless shoulder implant hollow screw fixation .
DOC.brief_title: Humeral Head Implants : Radiological Clinical Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Age 40 85 year time surgery Patients primary secondary osteoarthritis shoulder Patients cuff tear arthropathy axillary nerve lesion
